name: PLAYA3ULL
description: Playa3ull Games offers play-and-earn experiences, allowing players to collect, own, and earn from in-game assets. The platform provides a unique gaming ecosystem, enabling players to enjoy new experiences while participating in the world of gaming.

chains.name: PLAYA3ULL
chains.description: PLAYA3ULL GAMES is inspired by gamers and funded by our community. Gaming is changing from being an all consuming time-sink into a brand new asset class! It's time to lock and load!
